data.rationale:
It is similar to Data::JavaScript but lighter weight. It is unique
    in lighter weight in that the output is much denser and more terse
    that of Data::JavaScript, at the expense of being less robust.

    DESCRIPTION This module was inspired by the Data::JavaScript
    manpage, which while incredibly versatile, seems rather brute force
    and inelegant for certain forms of data. Specifically a series of
    objects of the same class, which it seems is a likely use for this
    kind of feature. So this module was created to provide a lightweight
    means of producing configurable, clean and compact output.
